name: viking-bio-pwa (Pico W)
postCreateCommand: git submodule update --init --recursive || true && if [ ! -d "${containerWorkspaceFolder}/pico-sdk" ]; then git clone --depth 1 --branch 2.2.0 https://github.com/raspberrypi/pico-sdk.git ${containerWorkspaceFolder}/pico-sdk && (cd ${containerWorkspaceFolder}/pico-sdk && git submodule update --init); fi && pip3 install --user -r tools/requirements.txt || true
